texto: Archiving is done in accordance with the audit, knowledge retention, and project closure purposes. The media, location and protection of the information are selected in accordance with the specified storage and retrieval periods, and with organization policy, agreements and legislation. Arrangements are put in place to retain necessary information items after project closure. 5) Dispose of unwanted, invalid or unvalidated information. NOTE This is done according to organization policy, and security and privacy requirements.
